companies.name: OpenAI
companies.summary: AI research and product company behind GPT models and ChatGPT; APIs for developers and enterprise.
companies.source_note: 2025 annualized revenue ~$13B; 2024 revenue ~$3.7B; valuation ~$300B reported Aug 2025

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.summary: Claude models for enterprise; focus on AI safety and reliability; major cloud partnerships.
companies.source_note: Series F valuing Anthropic at $183B; revenue run-rate ~ $5B; 2024 revenue ~$1B

companies.name: Lovable
companies.summary: Generates full-stack web apps from natural-language prompts; rapidly scaling product-led motion.
companies.source_note: Company blog: $200M Series A at ~$1.8B valuation

companies.name: Perplexity
companies.summary: Answer engine for consumers and enterprises; conversational search with cited sources.

companies.name: Databricks
companies.summary: Lakehouse platform for managing and analyzing AI/data workloads; strong enterprise adoption.
companies.source_note: Company press release (Dec 2024) + ARR est. $3.7B as of Jul 2025 (Sacra).
